definition: surname Yi/abbr. for 伊拉克[Yi1 la1 ke4], Iraq/abbr. for 伊朗[Yi1 lang3], Iran

(old) third person singular pronoun ("he" or "she")/second person singular pronoun ("you")/(May 4th period) third person singular feminine pronoun ("she")/(Classical Chinese) introductory particle with no specific meaning/that (preceding a noun)
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
an earthwork/castle/position of defense/stronghold/used in place names, often as phonetic bao for "burg" or "bad"
variant of 鋪|铺[pu4]/used in place names

sentences.english: The prime minister was flying back to Islamabad from Lahore.
sentences.chinese: 吉拉尼总理当时正从拉合尔飞回伊斯兰堡。
芭芭拉普莱特，伊斯兰堡报道。

sentences.english: Islamabad has not yet said when the Torkham border post will be re-opened.
sentences.chinese: 伊斯兰堡还没有说，当托尔哈姆边境站将重新开放。

sentences.english: And today I would like to specially mention the students of ICI.
sentences.chinese: 今天，我还想特别提及伊斯兰堡孔子学院的学生。

sentences.english: One commander scorned the Islamabad government as an American stooge.
sentences.chinese: 一个指挥官鄙视伊斯兰堡政府称其为美国傀儡。

sentences.english: Tricia is an art critic from Islamabad.
sentences.chinese: 特礼西亚是来自伊斯兰堡的艺术批评家。

sentences.english: Islamabad complains loudly that it's excluded from the US intelligence loop.
sentences.chinese: 伊斯兰堡对被美国情报网排除在外大为不满。

sentences.english: But the relationship between Islamabad and Washington has long been ugly and disingenuous.
sentences.chinese: 但其实伊斯兰堡和华盛顿的关系早就已经臭名昭彰。

sentences.english: The talk is of “betrayal” by the government in Islamabad.
sentences.chinese: 在伊斯兰堡的会谈是关于政府的“泄密”。

sentences.english: A target for target practice for soldiers undergoing training at a facility southeast of Islamabad.
sentences.chinese: 伊斯兰堡东南的一个让士兵练习射击使用的靶。

sentences.english: Islamabad is part of his constituency.
sentences.chinese: 伊斯兰堡是他的选区之一。

sentences.english: Islamabad reacted with fury to the attack.
sentences.chinese: 伊斯兰堡对袭击的反应是暴怒。

pinyin: Ya4 di4 si1 Ya4 bei4 ba1
